elements.body:
We reference stringent standards and then formulate more complete and strict tests. Every process from design to production requires meticulous work to ensure reliability and safety of products.

*ISO9001:2015 quality management system

*GMP production standards

*Precision testing instruments

*A professional quality control team of 106 individuals

*Dust-free workshop

*50+ inspection processes

*Various Product certifications(CE, RoHS, FCC etc)
